issue.title: [Archery][Integration] Support round trip tests for compression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Archery and corresponding language bindings should support round trip testing for compression.  

Today we only have checks on generated "gold" files from C++ we should also support round trip testing, now that there is a java implementation and a WIP Go implementation.
